name: Kyube
description:
Kyoobe pronounced cube is a challenging but fun Platformer to keep busy when you're bored and want something to keep you busy. Join Kooybo on his quest to find answers to where he is. Kooybo wakes up in an unknown facility decorated as a garden.
This is my first game i ever finished! Oh and I am 16 i think that is pretty important have pity on me and buy the game! I am currently working on the touchscreen controls so i can publish it on android!
